# Control Flow

## if-else block

## cond: multiple if-else blocks

```elixir
cond do
  expression_1 -> do_1
  expression_2 -> do_2
  ...
end
```

## case: case when with pattern matching

```elixir
case expression do
  pattern_1 -> do_1
  pattern_2 -> do_2
    ...
end
```

```elixir
def max(a,b) do
  case a >= b do
    true -> a
    false -> b
  end
end
```
